title: Discrete Distribution as Horizontal Bar Chart
description: In this lab, we will learn how to visualize discrete distributions using horizontal stacked bar charts. We will use Matplotlib, a popular plotting library in Python, to create a survey results visualization.

meta.title: Visualizing Discrete Distributions with Horizontal Bar Charts
meta.description: Learn how to create engaging survey result visualizations using Python and Matplotlib.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, python, horizontal bar chart, discrete distribution, data visualization
